text:
Neil Funk (born December 29, 1946) is the current television announcer for the NBA's Chicago Bulls alongside Stacey King.
Funk was born in New York. He studied at Syracuse University. Funk was raised in Indianapolis, Indiana. He got his first job in Danville, Illinois. He is currently married to Renee Funk and they have one child, William Funk. He now lives in Chicago, Illinois.
